mean_cn: vt. 将…制成表；把…列表显示；  vi. 制成表格；列表显示；  adj. 平面的；板状的
mean_en: to arrange information in an organized way so that it can be studied, recorded, etc.
word_etyma: tabul桌子 + ate形容词后缀 → tabulate 平板状的；制成表格
short_phrase: tabulate the number of "yes", "no", and "maybe" answers
sentence: I tabulated their results of the final year exam.
sentence_trans: 我把他们的期末成绩做成了表格。
